sqlMap.select: SELECT s.CITYID AS cityId, s.DISTID AS distId, s.UDFLAG AS udFlag, s.DISTNAME AS distName, s.FLAG AS distFlag, t.CITYNAME AS cityName FROM m_district AS s RIGHT JOIN m_city AS t ON s.CITYID = t.CITYID WHERE t.CITYID = '0411' AND s.UDFLAG = 0 ORDER BY s.DISTID ;

SELECT s.CITYID AS cityId, s.DISTID AS distId, s.UDFLAG AS udFlag, s.DISTNAME AS distName, s.FLAG AS distFlag, t.CITYNAME AS cityName FROM m_district AS s RIGHT JOIN m_city AS t ON s.CITYID = t.CITYID WHERE t.CITYID = '0411' AND s.UDFLAG = 1 ORDER BY s.DISTID ;
